amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 119-130 to codify Biden-era guidance to ensure that budget neutrality requirements for Section 1115 Waivers take into account downstream savings.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to codify Biden-era guidance to ensure that budget neutrality requirements for section 1115 waivers take into account downstream savings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 213 (Roll no. 150).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 213 (Roll no. 150).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
